alert.note: Alert for Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Price and southeastern Sawyer Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 643 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Squirrel Lake, to 10 miles northwest of Hawkins, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Catawba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Wisconsin.
